posts.message: Sorry for everyone here, specially the guys working on the Islamic app (Great idea by the way ).. for not responding lately

This group for Software Developers Worldwide.
We can share our ideas and information about everything in the Software Field, Job opportunities, Technical Questions and Events.
Our main Goal in this group is to improve the Software Development Skills to the Group's Members.
All Developers all over the world are invited to join us.

With my best regards,
Amr Saafan

posts.description: The country selector. It’s there when you create an account for a new Web service, check out of an e-commerce store or sign up for a conference. The normal design? A drop-down list with all of the available countries.
